document_data.name: Narlkond
document_data.mainbody: '''Narlkond''' was a [[Shar]]ran priest during the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had noticeable ritual scarring on his forearms, and when in ritual, he wore a mantle of shards between his legs, drawing blood with every step.
document_data.Activities: He was a senior priest at the [[House of Holy Night]].
document_data.Relationships: Dread Sister [[Avroana]] wasn't as confident as Narlkond was in his scheme.{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|724|19}}
document_data.History: In early spring of the {{yearlinkName|767}}, Narlkond had magically sent for many other priests of Shar after trapping an avatar of [[Mystra]]—[[Dasumia]], the Queen of [[Galadorna]]—and discovering that through mass ritual human sacrifice, he could entrap the avatar and siphon away its power to grant his own priests the [[spell]]s of [[wizard]]s. They agreed to supply him with Sharran faithful.
